items.name: swipe-row
items.title: Swipe Row
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A swipe row for providing actions of swipe of left and right

items.name: discussion
items.title: Discussion
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A component for displaying nested discussions or comment threads.

items.name: spinning-circle
items.title: Spinning Circle
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable spinning circle loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth animations and optional loading messages.

items.name: morphing-square
items.title: Morphing Square
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable morphing square loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth shape transitions and optional loading messages.

items.name: orbital-loader
items.title: Orbital Loader
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable orbital loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth orbital animations and optional loading messages.

items.name: typewriter-loader
items.title: Typewriter Loader
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable typewriter loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth typing animations and customizable text content.

items.name: profile-menu
items.title: Profile Menu
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: An animated collapsible profile menu component with smooth transitions and customizable content sections.
